code: import'./Footer.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Footer=function Footer(props){var completedTodoCount=props.todos.reduce(function(pre,todo){return pre+(todo.isDone?1:0);},0);var total=props.todos.length;var handleCheckAll=function handleCheckAll(event){props.checkAllTodo(event.target.checked);};var handleDeleteAllCompleted=function handleDeleteAllCompleted(){props.deleteAllCompleted();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"todo-footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"Checkbox",onChange:handleCheckAll,checked:completedTodoCount===total&&total!==0?true:false})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Completed: ",completedTodoCount]})," / Total:",total]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDeleteAllCompleted,className:"btn btn-danger",children:"Remove completed task(s)"})]});};export default Footer;
